eventDecorators.name: FundsReceived
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new owner.

parameterDecorators.name: previousOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the previous owner.

functionDecorators.name: getHolders
functionDecorators.description: Returns array of accounts for current liquid split.

functionDecorators.name: nftContract
functionDecorators.description: address of ERC721 contract with controlling tokens.

functionDecorators.name: sortAddresses
functionDecorators.description: Returns sorted array of accounts for 0xSplits.

functionDecorators.name: tokenIds
functionDecorators.description: array of token holders as split recipients.

functionDecorators.name: updateHolders
functionDecorators.description: Returns array of accounts for current liquid split.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: distributes ETH to Liquid Split NFT holders.
